conversations.body_text: Hi István Mikle,       Your order has been shipped in two separate packages:  1. The Pro X pedals are currently sold out at our US warehouse. We have urgently arranged air freight and expect shipment on the 22nd, with an estimated delivery date around the 25th.  2. The power supply was temporarily out of stock for two weeks due to a product upgrade. The upgrade is now complete, and we will begin shipping these items in the coming days according to order sequence.  We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Should you have any questions, we will prioritize addressing them for you.
